title: Iran gained access to election results server in 2020, military reveals
description: U.S. officials disrupted the attack before the votes were tallied.

title: Apple prevails in antitrust battle over the future of the App Store
description: The appeals affirmed that the Fortnite maker failed to prove that Apple’s policies constituted anticompetitive conduct afoul of federal antitrust laws.

title: Amazon delivery firm allows its drivers to unionize with the Teamsters
description: The Teamsters pledged two years ago to unionize Amazon delivery drivers, who are not employed directly by the company.

title: Supreme Court to decide if officials can block constituents on social media
description: At issue is whether the First Amendment guarantees access to personal social-media accounts that are used by public officials to communicate with constituents.

title: AI is hijacking these actors’ voices. Can you tell the difference?
description: Advances in generative artificial intelligence, technology that forms texts, images or sounds, has allowed software to recreate people’s voices with eerie precision.

title: San Francisco is a postcard from a driverless car future. Here’s what it’s like.
description: In San Francisco, hundreds of self-driving cars are filling the streets, confusing and angering some residents while impressing bicyclists and tourists.
